description: This file defines a middleware component for handling exceptions globally within an ASP.NET Core application. It intercepts unhandled exceptions during request processing and returns consistent JSON-formatted error responses with appropriate HTTP status codes.

classes.name: ErrorHandlingMiddleware
classes.description: A middleware class for catching and processing exceptions, converting them into standardized JSON error responses.

methods.name: InvokeAsync
methods.description: Main method to invoke middleware logic, catching exceptions and delegating error responses.

methods.name: WriteProblem
methods.description: Helper method to write a JSON error body to the HTTP response with specified status and message.
